description:
This course is for women who want to really know the man they are dealing with. Whether you are entering a relationship or have suspicions that he's not telling you the whole truth, this course is for you.

Materials used:

  1. videos
  2. photos
  3. email access

Take this course if you want to know whether you've met Prince Charming or just another loser. This will also improve your communication skills in any personal or business situation.
title: Signs Of Lying - Is He Really Mr. Right?
